memberSignatures.value: public abstract Chr.Avro.Abstract.Schema BuildSchema (Chr.Avro.Resolution.TypeResolution resolution, System.Collections.Generic.IDictionary<Type,Chr.Avro.Abstract.Schema> cache);

.method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance class Chr.Avro.Abstract.Schema BuildSchema(class Chr.Avro.Resolution.TypeResolution resolution, class System.Collections.Generic.IDictionary`2<class System.Type, class Chr.Avro.Abstract.Schema> cache) cil managed

parameters.name: resolution
parameters.summary: The resolution to build a schema for.

parameters.name: cache
parameters.summary:
A schema cache. If a schema is cached for a specific type, that schema will be returned
            for all subsequent occurrences of the type.

overloads.summary:
Builds a schema for a type resolution. If the case does not apply to the provided
            resolution, this method should throw an exception.
